Name: Moon Bus
About the game: Moon Bus brings 2 - 4 players together to play a competitive game on a single computer. Players must skillfully maneuver their lunar lander style busses to compete for passengers. Disrupt other players or keep it civil, fly fast or fly safe, there are many play styles but whoever delivers the most passengers will come out on top! Couch Multiplayer Only. 2 - 4 Players.

Meta Description: Looking for information on Moon Bus? Check out the release date (Sep 6, 2019), developer insights from Ian Hern, and a complete game summary.
